Package hardwareStore

Class Printer

java.lang.Object
hardwareStore.Technique
hardwareStore.Printer
public class Printer extends Technique
A class containing information about printers.
Parameters: model, printSpeed and isColored.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Lyutova Anna

    • Printer

      public Printer()
      Default class printer constructor.

      Printer(String, int, String, int, Boolean)

    • Printer

      public Printer​(String firm_temp, int price_temp, String model_temp, int ps_temp, Boolean ic_temp)
      Class printer constructor with params.
      Parameters:
      firm_temp - temporary parameter of the company name.
      price_temp - temporary parameter of printers's price.
      model_temp - temporary parameter of printers's model.
      ps_temp - temporary parameter of printing speed.
      ic_temp - temporary boolean parameter of printer's color of printing.

  • Method Details

    • setModel

      public void setModel​(String model_temp)
      This function sets the model of the printer.
      Parameters:
      model_temp - temporary parameter of the printer's model.

    • setPrintSpeed

      public void setPrintSpeed​(int ps_temp)
      This function sets the speed of the printing.
      Parameters:
      ps_temp - temporary parameter of the speed of printing.

    • setIsColored

      public void setIsColored​(char ic_temp)
      This boolean function sets the color of printing. 'y' - colored / 'n' - black-and-white.
      Parameters:
      ic_temp - temporary parameter of the color of printing.
